code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserSearch=()=>{const[login,setlogin]=useState('');const history=useNavigate();const handleUserSubmit=()=>{if(login){history("/user/books/".concat(login));}else{alert('Пожалуйста, введите имя пользователя.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ID_enter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\u0412\u0432\u0435\u0434\u0438\u0442\u0435 login \u043F\u043E\u043B\u044C\u0437\u043E\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0435\u043B\u044F",value:login,onChange:e=>setlogin(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUserSubmit,children:"\u041E\u0442\u043F\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u044C"})]});};export default UserSearch;
